metadata.title: CVE-2024-25638 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: dnsjava is an implementation of DNS in Java. Records in DNS replies are notchecked for their relevance to the query, allowing an attacker to respondwith RRs from different zones. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.6.0.

criterions.comment: dnsjava package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
